abstract: James Ryerson reviews books Waiting for Contact: The Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence by Lawrence Squeri, Welcome to the Universe: An Astrophysical Tour by Neil DeGrasse Tyson, All These Worlds Are Yours: The Scientific Search for Alien Life by Jon Willis and Placing Outer Space: An Earthly Ethnography of Other Worlds by Lisa Messeri.
lead_paragraph: The notion that life, including intelligent life, exists beyond Earth seems more persuasive than ever. Four new books take a look at the search, and the searchers.
